Title: Repeals the prohibition on fossil fuel equipment and building systems in new buildings; repealer
Summary: Repeals the prohibition on fossil fuel equipment and building systems in new buildings that is to become effective in 2026.
LawCode: Rpld §11-104 subs 7 & 8, sub 6 ¶(b), Energy L; rpld §378 sub 19, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal certain provisions of the energy law and the executive law, in relation to the prohibition on fossil fuel equipment and building systems in new buildings
